response:
Dear All,

We are pleased to inform you that « [REDACTED] » has decided to initiate this direct RFQ to select an approved MRO capable of performing the work package for its Aircraft ATR72-600. Tender submissions should be prepared and presented in accordance with the international RFQ guidelines outlined in the attached file. Offers must be sent either via email to [REDACTED] or by registered or express mail (rapid post).

1. If you choose to submit your offer (including all required documents) by email, please ensure that no other email addresses are included in the copy, and send it exclusively to [REDACTED].

2. If you opt to send your offer via registered or express mail, the proposal must be placed in an outer sealed envelope, sealed and anonymous, clearly indicating the address of [REDACTED] and marked with: “DO NOT OPEN, A/C ATR72-600 Consultation.” The offer should be sent via “Rapid Post” to the following address: « [REDACTED] ».

The deadline for receipt of offers is October 12th, 2023, at midnight. The validity period of the tender shall be 120 days from the closing date. Please note that the bid opening session will not be open to the public.

Best regards,
target_response: Dear all, We are pleased to inform you that Tunisair Express has decided to launch a Request for Quotation (RFQ) to select an approved MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul) company for the work-package of its ATR72-600 aircraft. Tenders should be prepared and presented in accordance with the international RFQ in the attached file. Tender offers can be sent either by email to <PRESIDIO_ANONYMIZED_EMAIL_ADDRESS> or by registered mail or express mail (rapid post). 1. If you choose to send your offer (including all requested documents) by email to <PRESIDIO_ANONYMIZED_EMAIL_ADDRESS>, please ensure that you do not include any other email addresses in the copy. Forward your offer only through <PRESIDIO_ANONYMIZED_EMAIL_ADDRESS>. 2. If you choose to send your offer via registered mail or express mail (rapid post), the offer must be placed in a sealed outer envelope, labeled as "DO NOT OPEN, A/C ATR72-600 Consultation" and addressed to the following: Monsieur le Directeur Général de la société des lignes intérieures et internationales (Tunisairexpress) Immeuble MAGREBIA TOUR A, 9 rue de l'artisanat- Z.I la Charguia II -2035 Tunis Carthage The closing date for the receipt of offers is October 12th, 2023, at midnight. The validity period of the tender shall be 120 days from the closing date. The bid opening session will not be public. Best regards,
